price: 225. Argi nematai, kad jie kalba apie kiekvieną dalyką (šlovindami žmones – gerus ar blogus) savo poezijose?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ وَادٖ يَهِيمُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alam tara annahum fī kulli wādin yahīmūna
